products.name: Dog Food Premium
products.description: Nutritious premium dog food made with real meat and essential vitamins to support healthy digestion, strong bones, and a shiny coat. Carefully formulated to provide balanced daily nutrition, this food helps maintain energy levels, muscle strength, and overall well-being for adult dogs of all breeds.

products.name: Cat Toy
products.description: Interactive cat toy designed to stimulate hunting instincts, reduce boredom, and keep your cat active and entertained indoors.
